title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte

Meet your easiest eye look ever. Julep’s Eyeshadow 101 Stick in Putty Matte delivers rich, highly pigmented color in a soft light taupe-pink that flatters every day and every skin tone. The crème-to-powder formula glides on effortlessly, blends like a dream, and sets to a smooth, crease-proof matte finish that lasts.

Why you’ll love it:
- Highly pigmented, true-color payoff in a universally wearable Putty Matte shade.
- Crème-to-powder formula: creamy glide-on application that sets to a soft, budge-proof finish.
- Long wear you can trust: waterproof and crease-proof to stay fresh from day to night.
- Skin-loving ingredients: infused with Vitamin C and Vitamin E for antioxidant protection and nourishment, plus candelilla wax for smooth, tug-free application.
- Gentle on delicate, sensitive skin with hydration and barrier support to help improve tone and texture over time.
- No tools needed: brush-free stick with a built-in smudger for easy blending on the go.
- Versatile shade wardrobe: available across Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic finishes with 30+ shades to mix, match, and layer.

How to use:
1) Sweep the stick directly onto lids.  
2) For a soft wash or smoky edge, coat the built-in smudger with color and blend.  
3) Use the smudger or your fingertips to diffuse.  
4) Blend before the formula sets for a seamless finish.

What’s inside:
- Vitamin C: brightening antioxidant that helps defend against environmental stressors.  
- Vitamin E: conditions and nourishes the delicate eye area.  
- Candelilla Wax: cushions glide for smooth, skip-free application.

The result: effortless, one-and-done eyes that feel as good as they look—matte, modern, and locked in all day.
